refnamediv.refpurpose: Changes the user of the specified mysqlnd database connection

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
connection
Mysqlnd connection handle. Do not modify!
user
The MySQL user name.
password
The MySQL password.
database
The MySQL database to change to.
silent
Controls if mysqlnd is allowed to emit errors or not.
passwd_len
Length of the MySQL password.
